Lines.line: **** COMMODORE 64 BASIC V2 ****
64K RAM SYSTEM  38911 BASIC BYTES FREE
READY.
You are an Air Force Captain assigned to the 89th Special
Operations Group at Andrews AFB, Maryland. You have just
been transferred to the Operations Center and are alone
on the swing shift.
You get up to get another cup of coffee and wander into
the vault. As you glance around the room, you see, on the
far wall, floor to ceiling shelves with thousands of tape
reels stored side by side.
On the wall to your left are half a dozen, safe-type filing
cabinets which appear to be locked. On the wall to your right
is a locked metal door.

Actions.text: Try to open the metal door
Leave the vault and return to your desk

Lines.line: You return to your desk, settle into your chair and never go
exploring again. You obviously made the wrong choice.
You proceed to the door and try the handle. It is locked.
On the door is a sign which states:
ACCESS LIMITED
SECTION 'G' PERSONNEL
ONLY
EXECUTIVE ORDER 117069
You stare puzzled, wondering who Section 'G' personnel are?
You wonder if your boss may have a file in his office which
will fill you in on Section 'G'.

Actions.text: Return to your desk and think things out
